articles.author: EMILY WANG FUJIYAMA, HUIZHONG WU
articles.title: Russia's Putin expresses gratitude to China's Xi for Ukraine peace plan - The Associated Press
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese leader Xi Jinping reaffirmed their “no-limits” partnership that has deepened as both countries face rising tensions with the West. They criticized U.S. military alliances in Asia and the Pacific region. Putin on Th…
articles.content: BEIJING (AP) Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Thursday reaffirmed their no-limits partnership that has deepened as both countries face rising tensions with the West, … [+7187 chars]
